item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network to learn about email marketing at an event sponsored by Cereus Women.

Space is limited. See below for registration details. This workshop is promoted elsewhere, so don't delay.

About This Event

Social Media has radically changed the way we do business – flattening the playing field for the small business owner, creating GLOBAL opportunities to be of service and enhancing our ability to have a fun and funded lifestyle that is free of the old rules of the great game of business. The biggest key to leveraging your social media time for profit is to create and nurture effective strategic alliances and to build long term win-win partnerships with colleagues who care.

Benefits For The Audience

During this informative and entertaining talk the audience will learn

  • 3 Easy Secrets to Crystallize Your Connection To Allies and Complementary Colleagues
  • The Power in Cultivating Your Own Sacred Social Media Space
  • How structure supports success and the importance of knowing when to delegate
  • The 7 Part Formula to Be Heard By Millions
  • Learning the “Art of the Ask” and how to create win-win partnerships by leveraging your connections

Format

  • Cost: $15 in advance/$20 at the door
  • One 45 minute presentation followed by ~15 minutes of Q&A, plus time for networking.
  • Bring plenty of business cards.
  • Coffee and muffins will be provided.

Agenda

Our agenda for the meeting will be as follows:

9:00 – Sign in and networking, (registration for those not prepaid)
9:10 – Meetup News and go around the room introducing yourself and sharing business cards
9:20 – Presentation with Q&A
10:20 – Closing remarks, Upcoming events
10:30 – Meeting ends

About the Presenter

Amethyst Wyldfyre, The Empowered Messenger Master Mentor is an internationally known speaker, author, transformation artist and healer who is specializes in helping visionary entrepreneurs who want to expand their reach to a global audience, speak their authentic truth and prosper from following their spiritual path so that they can lead and serve, create and redistribute wealth and inspire, influence and be heard by millions of people around the world.

An award winning life-long serial entrepreneur and well known spiritual leader on the internet Amethyst has been a contributing author in 6 best selling books including 2 international best sellers and has appeared on hundreds of virtual stages around the globe building her own multi six figure business in under three years mostly in her pajamas!

About the Host

Kim Reddington’s entrepreneurial career started in 1995 after she decidedthat dropping her year old son off at day care every day was just too heart-wrenching. She realized the only way to have the flexibility she needed was to create it herself. That’s when she just quit and took off on her own.

Kim’s journey has led her to helping other women entrepreneurs think big with their online marketing to get all the clients they need and is known as a Client-Generating Website Guru. She helps her clients to build a system around their website that will convert their prospective clients into paying clients.

Driving using GPS?

If you are using a GPS or Navigation System, 1900 West Park Drive often does not appear. Use 1 Research Drive (University of Phoenix) and from there enter Westborough Office Park on West Park Drive, go 1/2 mile, 1900 is on your right. Suite 280 is on the second floor.

Cost and How to Register

$15 in advance/$20 at the door.  Capacity is limited and the event is promoted elsewhere, so you need get a ticket in advance.

Register here or click the Paypal button to reserve your spot.

If you don't have a Paypal account, you can still pay through this link.  First click the Paypal button above, then follow the link labelled "Don't Have a Paypal Account?" to pay with your credit card without logging in to Paypal.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Nurturing Effective Strategic Alliances Via Social Media to Expand Your Reach
